英文法規名稱: Standards for the Safety Tolerance of Atomic Dust and Radioactivity Contamination in Foods
中文法規名稱: 食品中原子塵或放射能污染安全容許量標準

法規內容.條文內容: The Standards are established in accordance with the provisions of the second paragraph of Article 15 of the Act Governing Food Sanitation.

The safety tolerances of atomic dust and radioactivity contamination in foods:

┌───────────┬─────────┬────────┐
│        ＼    Food    │Milk products and │Other foods     │
│category  ＼          │infant foods      │                │
│Radioactive ＼        │                  │                │
│nucleus       ＼      │                  │                │
├───────────┼─────────┼────────┤
│131                   │Not more than     │Not more than   │
│   I                  │55Bq/kg           │300 Bq/kg       │
├───────────┼─────────┼────────┤
│134   137             │Not more than 370 │Not more than   │
│   Cs+   Cs           │Bq/kg             │370 Bq/kg 　　  │
└───────────┴─────────┴────────┘
The Standards shall be implemented from the date of promulgation.
